mapper.insert: insert into add_info (add_id, user_id, add_time, add_date, add_state) values (#{addId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{userId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{addTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{addDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{addState,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.select: select add_id, user_id, add_time, add_date, add_state from add_info
